sentences.en: There was an inevitability about their defeat.
sentences.cn: 他们的失败自有其必然。

sentences.en: We are all bound by the inevitability of death.
There is a certain inevitability that ebook sales have now overtaken paperback sales on Amazon's US site.
sentences.cn: 电子书在亚马逊美国网站上的销量已经超过平装书，这是不可避免的。
